name: Idle Magic Legend
description:
This is an idle game, with the theme of magic world. It can be idled and has a wealth of maneuverable space.

  • Abundant equipment, strengthening system, entry.
  • Gongfa practice, skill system,
  • Alchemy, refining, planting.
  • Gold, wood, water, fire, earth and five elements bonus.
  • Form a team in the tavern, recruit teammates, Taoist couples, couples, gay friends, lilies, etc.
  • Swords, axes, staves, bows, and weapons are sent differently.
  • Real-time battle effects.
  • pet
